obligations.label: Report Preparation Obligation
obligations.definition: Duty to prepare a comprehensive report addressing manufacture, use, and characteristics of organic compound
obligations.scope: Prepare technical report on emerging contaminant
obligations.source_text: retained by Client W to prepare a comprehensive report addressing the manufacture, use, and characteristics

obligations.label: Design Document Preparation Obligation
obligations.definition: Duty to develop engineering design documents for groundwater infrastructure modifications
obligations.scope: Develop plans and specifications for infrastructure modifications
obligations.source_text: tasked to develop engineering design documents (plans and specifications)

obligations.label: Groundwater Analysis Obligation
obligations.definition: Duty to perform analysis of site groundwater monitoring data
obligations.scope: Analyze monitoring data from site observed for over a year
obligations.source_text: perform an analysis of groundwater monitoring data from a site Engineer A had been observing

obligations.label: Content Verification Obligation
obligations.definition: Duty to verify accuracy and originality of work product content
obligations.scope: Cross-check facts and verify content does not plagiarize
obligations.fulfillment: Partially fulfilled for report, inadequately fulfilled for designs
obligations.source_text: cross-checking key facts against professional journal articles and verifying the phrasing

obligations.label: Regulatory Compliance Obligation
obligations.definition: Duty to ensure engineering designs comply with applicable local regulations
obligations.scope: Include all required safety features per local regulations
obligations.violation: Omitted key safety features required by local regulations
obligations.source_text: omission of key safety features required by local regulations

obligations.label: Document Revision Obligation
obligations.definition: Duty to revise plans to satisfy professional and regulatory standards after client identifies deficiencies
obligations.source_text: instructed Engineer A to revise the plans, ensuring that all elements satisfied the necessary professional and regulatory standards
